benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Modify custom fields to payment

covered: Valid Request: Multiple scenarios verify successful PUT with proper headers and payloads (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC17).
Non-Existing Resource: TC06 demonstrates 404 when payment not found.

Error Handling and Validation: Scenarios cover 400 errors for invalid paymentId format (TC05), missing header (TC07), missing body (TC08), malformed JSON (TC09), invalid objects (TC10), unauthorized access (TC11), and server error (TC12).
Edge cases: Large payloads (TC14, TC20), max length (TC15), extra properties (TC16), duplicates (TC18).
Performance: Concurrent requests (TC19), large payload performance (TC20).
Data integrity: Duplicate field handling (TC18) and integration (TC17).
gaps: Partial update semantics for PUT vs full replacement are not explicitly tested (e.g., non-full updates or no-ops beyond empty array).
Rate limiting / throttling tests are missing.
Caching behavior / ETag or Cache-Control headers are not tested.
403 Forbidden scenarios for insufficient permissions are not tested.
Advanced concurrency edge cases (race conditions on same resource) are not deeply explored beyond TC19.
recommendations: Add tests for 403 Forbidden to cover insufficient permissions.
Add rate limiting tests to ensure proper throttling and error handling under load.
Add caching tests to validate ETag/Cache-Control behavior and caching semantics.
Clarify and test PUT semantics for partial updates vs full replacement (e.g., expect error on partial payload if not allowed).
Enhance concurrency testing with explicit race-condition scenarios on the same resource (read-modify-write sequences).
